mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND memberID = #{memberID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( memberName , memberID , memberNickName , memberPW , memberDob , memberEmail , memberPhone , regDT , delNY ) VALUES ( #{memberName},#{memberID},#{memberNickName},#{memberPW},#{memberDob},#{memberEmail},#{memberPhone},now() ,0)
mapper.select: SELECT memberId FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND memberId = #{keyID}
